sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: make update: This does the same as a make install with the exception that make update doesn't make backups of files it's replacing. One of the things net-tools replaces is sh-utils's version of /bin/hostname (net-tools's version is far better than sh-utils's version).
Also, if you decide to reinstall this package at some point in the future, a make update won't backup all the files from a previous net-tools installation.
